SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Domain class handing Board object.
BoardFragment
Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in GameViewModel, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
BoardsAdapter
This adapter class is used to create new board fragments for each user in each game.
BoardView
This view class extends the View class and implements OnTouchListener.
BoardView.OnClickListener
A nested Interface used to set the click listener for toggling shot placement.
BoardView.OnLongClickListener
A nested interface used to set the long click listener used to invoke pop-up menu used to move ships during ship placement.
DatabaseModule
Uses Dagger @Provides-annotated methods to satisfy dependencies on concrete implementations of LocalDatabase and UserDao.
DemoFragment
Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in LoginViewModel, UserViewModel, PermissionsViewModel, and PreferencesViewModel, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
Game
Encapsulates data and logic regarding the Game object.
GameFragment
Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in GameViewModel,as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
GameViewModel
This GameViewModel provides access (for a UI controller) to the current state of a game and updates player boards as a game goes on.
GoogleSignInService
Provides ReactiveX-integrated Google Sign In client flows for signing in, refreshing the bearer token, and signing out.
HomeFragment
Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in GameViewModel, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
JataApplication
Initializes (in the JataApplication.onCreate() method) application-level resources that cannot be handled with Hilt dependency injection.
JataLongPollServiceProxy
Requests updates to the Game object by making HTTP requests at regular intervals.
JataModule
Provides Hilt with proxies and annotations giving Hilt information about how they need to be built.
JataRepository
Links the ViewModel and the JataServiceProxy that talks to the server.
JataRepository.InvalidShipPlacementException
Defines custom exception thrown by JataRepository.changePlacement(List, int) when a user moves or rotates their ship into an invalid position.
JataServiceProxy
Invoked by the repository to make HTTP requests to the server.
LocalDatabase
Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
LocalDatabase.Callback
Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
LocalDatabase.Converters
Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just Instant) to one of those supported by Room/SQLite.
LoginActivity
Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
LoginViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current signed-in state and GoogleSignInAccount.
LoseDialogFragment
This LoseDialogFragment extends DialogFragment and makes a pop-up occur whenever you lose a game, with an option to navigate back to the home screen to start a new game.
MainActivity
Serves as a basic container activity—that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart from an options menu), but hosts a NavHostFragment for presentation of one or more Fragment instances, associated with a navigation graph.
NavigationGraphDirections
 
NavigationGraphDirections.ExplainPermissions
 
PermissionsExplanationFragment
Presents a modal dialog of rationales for permissions requested by this app.
PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener
Declares the PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener.onAcknowledge(String[]) method to be implemented by the host activity (typically using a lambda), to resume the permissions flow after display of the permission rationales/explanations.
PermissionsRepository
Implements a LiveData-based repository of permissions granted by the user, and handles the low-level details of the permissions flow.
PermissionsViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current permissions state—that is, to the set of permissions which have been granted by the user.
PreferencesRepository
Implements a LiveData-based repository of preferences.
PreferencesViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to some subset of the current preferences state.
SettingsActivity
Hosts an instance of SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment to present a settings screen without any additional UI elements (such as options menu).
SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment
Presents a standard settings screen, populated from the PreferenceScreen declared in res/xml/settings.xml.
Ship
Encapsulates the data elements and logic for ships in local data store.
Shot
Encapsulates the data and logic for shots fired during the game.
User
Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based persistent data store.
UserDao
Provides CRUD operations on User entity instances.
UserRepository
Provides high-level operations on a repository of User instances, backed by a SQLite database, in turn accessed via LocalDatabase.
UserViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the User entity instance corresponding to the current signed-in user, a user specified by its unique identifier (primary key value), and the full collection of users who have signed in to the app.
WinDialogueFragment
Informs the winning user that they have won.
